column1: 24155,Ultimate Wolverine Vs. Hulk (2005) #6,6,57149,18,"Had enough yet? Neither have we!!! Red-hot writer Damon Lindelof (LOST) and superstar artist Leinil Francis Yu (Secret Invasion) conclude the slobberknocker of the century! With his mission a wreck and Fury hot on his trail, can Wolverine pull himself together (literally & figuratively!!) to do what he does best before Hulk pounds him into oblivion first? Don't miss this explosive final chapter as the battle between Berserker and Behemoth goes to ELEVEN!! Rated T  ...$2.99",
